acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing or using LudiStock ("the App"), you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the App.
acceptance.content2: 1.1. License: LudiStock grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the App for your personal, non-commercial use, subject to these Terms and Conditions.

use.title: 2. Use of the App
use.content1: 2.1. User Accounts: To use certain features of the App, you may be required to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

privacy.title: 3. Privacy
privacy.content1: 3.1. Data Collection: The App may collect and store data related to your sleep patterns and health. LudiStock will handle this data in accordance with its Privacy Policy, which you can review separately.
privacy.content2: 3.2. User Data: You grant LudiStock permission to use your sleep-related data for research, analysis, and improvement of the App, provided that such data is anonymized and does not personally identify you.

content.title: 4. Content
content.content1: 4.1. Ownership: All content, including text, graphics, images, and other materials, made available through the App are the property of LudiStock or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
content.content2: 4.2. Restrictions: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from any content on the App without prior written consent from LudiStock.

conduct.title: 5. User Conduct
conduct.content1: 5.1. Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any of the following activities:
conduct.activity1: a. Using the App for any unlawful purpose.
conduct.activity2: b. Impersonating any person or entity or falsely stating or otherwise misrepresenting your affiliation with a person orentity.
conduct.activity3: c. Uploading or transmitting viruses, malware, or other malicious code.
conduct.activity4: d. Interfering with or disrupting the App or its servers.

warranties.title: 6. Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.content1: 6.1. The App is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to, warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content1: 7.1. To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, LudiStock shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content1: 8.1. LudiStock reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time, with or without cause and with or without notice.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law
governingLaw.content1: 9.1. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of France.

contact.title: 10. Contact Information
contact.content1: 10.1. If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at: ludystock@gmail.com.

collectInfo.title: 1. Information We Collect
collectInfo.content1: 1.1. Personal Information: We may collect personal information that you provide when using the App, including but not limited to your name, email address, sleep mood, sleep duration, and dream log entries.
collectInfo.content2: 1.2. Device Information: We may collect information about your device, such as your device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
collectInfo.content3: 1.3. Usage Information: We may collect information about how you use the App, including your interactions with the app's features and content.

useInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
useInfo.content1: 2.1. Personalization: We use the information you provide to personalize your experience with the App, including providing sleep insights, recommendations, and tracking your sleep patterns.
useInfo.content2: 2.2. Research and Analysis: We may use aggregated and anonymized data for research and analysis to improve the App's features and functionality.
useInfo.content3: 2.3. Communication: We may use your contact information to send you updates, newsletters, and important notices related to the App. You can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time.

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

disclosure.title: 4. Disclosure of Your Information
disclosure.content: We may share your personal information under the following circumstances:

choices.title: 5. Your Choices
choices.content1: 5.1. Access and Correction: You have the right to access and correct your personal information stored in the App. You can do so by editing your Profile under "Account Details", located in the "Profile" tab in your Dashboard. For any further issues, questions, or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at: ludystock@gmail.com.
choices.content2: 5.2. Data Deletion: You can request the deletion of your account and personal information. Please note that some information may be retained for legal or operational purposes.

children.title: 6. Children's Privacy
children.content: The App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, please contact us, and we will take steps to delete such information.

changes.title: 7. Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our data practices. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the revised policy on the App. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: ludystock@gmail.com.
